IS457 Data Storytelling (ACU/ACG)

This is the course website for Data Storytelling.

Below, you will find the materials for each week, as well as the syllabus that includes contact information and a course outline.

Lectures and Materials

Week 1

Week 1 - Holiday, no class!

Week 2

Week 2 - Introduction to Data Storytelling

overview concepts

Lecture 1.1 - Introduction to this course

The syllabus for the course, and an overview of course policies and materials.

Lecture 1.2 - A few items about quizzes

Info about how Reading Quizzes will work.

Lecture 1.4 - Names activity

Intro to the Names activity

Week 3

Week 3 - Storytelling Concepts & Tweet Critiques Intro

overview concepts data sources

Lecture 2.3 - Tweet Critiques

Introduction to our first Major Project.

Lecture 2.4 - Groups & Group Formation

Overview of how Groups will be formed and used throughout class.

Lecture 2.5 - Data Sources Intro

First look at possible sources of data.

Week 4

Week 4 - Tweet Critique Practice & Google Data Studio

Week 5

Week 5 - Change Management, Intro to PowerBI & Excel

Lecture 5.2 - PowerBI Intro

Our first foray into PowerBI!

Lecture 5.3 - Tweet Critique Class Expectations & Logistics

Class expectations for presenters and audience members.

Lecture 5.4 - Excel Setup

Get ready to use Excel and Power Query.

Week 6

Week 6 - Visualization Choices & Villainous Viz

Lecture 6.1 - Good & Bad Visualization Design

Design choices when making visualizations.

Lecture 6.2 - (Against) Visualization for Villainy

Introduction to MiP2

Week 7

Week 7 - Empathy & Viz for Villainy

Week 8

Week 8 - Twine & Framing Devices

framing devices

Lecture 8.2 -- Framing Devices & Intro to Twine

How to frame your story and introduce it to your audience and an introduction to Twine for framing and storyboarding.

Lecture 8.3 -- Announcements

Quick announcements and reminders.

Week 9

Week 9 - Spring Break, no class!

Week 10

Week 10 - Twine & Data Narratives

data narratives framing devices

Lecture 10.1 -- Announcements and Guest Lecturers

Announcements & a bit about our upcoming esteemed guest professors.

Lecture 10.2 -- Data Narratives

Different narrative styles for use with data.

Week 11

Week 11 - Peer Review, Organizing Story Structure

Lecture 11.1 -- Decluttering Slides

Techniques to declutter slides.

Week 12

Week 12 - Community Data Stories with Prof. Moss

Week 13

Week 13 - Community Data Story Presentations

Week 14

Week 14 - Final Considerations for Data Stories with Prof. McDowell

Week 15

Week 15 - Final Data Stories Peer Feedback

data narratives framing devices

Lecture 15.1 -- Expectations & Format for Final Data Stories

Different narrative styles for use with data.

Week 16

Week 16 - Final Data Stories!
